scenario_text.value: I refuse! I told you not to come here!

I’m just asking you to hear me out, you
birdbrain!

Better a birdbrain than a blockhead. Be
reasonable for once!
Oh gee, are you sure we shouldn’t stop him?

...This is Minoru’s fight. We shouldn’t
interfere.

Let’s trust him, and keep looking around the
area.

I’m worried about him and Falcomon, but let’s
focus on our <color=#B41919>search</color> for now.
